name: Chatpate
desc: Typical nepali snack that is spicy. Contains onions, chillies, cucumber, tomatoes garnished with corriander and lemon

name: Wai Wai Sadheko
desc: Snack made by mixing Wai Wai (Nepali noodles) with onions, chillies, cucumber, tomatoes garnished with corriander and lemon

name: Sukuti Chatpate
desc: Contains sukuti (Nepali beef jerky) onions, chillies, cucumber, tomatoes garnished with corriander and lemon
